name: Thermospheric density
description: Thermospheric density at the satellite location along with auxiliary parameters (altitude, latitude, longitude and local solar time). Derived from non-gravitational accelerations based on precise orbit determination data only (ACCxPOD_2_)
variables_table:
Variable,Units,Description,Dim,Type
time,-,-,1,CDF_EPOCH
density,kg/m3,-,1,CDF_DOUBLE
density_orbitmean,kg/m3,-,1,CDF_DOUBLE
validity_flag,unknown units,-,1,CDF_INT1
altitude,m,-,1,CDF_DOUBLE
latitude,deg,-,1,CDF_DOUBLE
longitude,deg,-,1,CDF_DOUBLE
local_solar_time,h,-,1,CDF_DOUBLE
